template.description: Test Control DB Example 3 : Select Data From DB & Put It Into File
template.name: DB_Example_3_PutFile

processGroups.comments: Test Control DB Example 3 : Select Data From DB & Put It Into File

entry.value: select Book_id, Name, CASE WHEN Price>=100 THEN 'High' WHEN Price<100 THEN 'Low' end PriceLevel from Flowfile

processGroups.name: DB Example 3 : PutFile
